questions.quote: Oh! Rimsky -- great great book if I may say so sir. I almost read the whole thing.
I know it may sound shocking. But, I just can't stop myself from... wanting you.
You're swimming in the East River? The most heavily trafficked overly contaminated waterway on the eastern seaboard?
George is right. Those people will try to get away with murder. Believe me. They're all crooks.
Religion, my friend, that's what happened to me. Because, I have just been informed that it's going to cost Elaine the sum of five thousand dollars to get the apartment upstairs.
No no, look. I'll tell you what -- they're having a sale right.
What are you doing? You're making more than I am. A secretary cannot make more than her boss.
Hi, I got some friends inside, I gotta get a message to 'em. Mind if I walk through real quick?
Wow! Coming out of the shower... It's a good thing they gave you that washcloth to cover yourself up... What is this an ad for?
Because I'm like ice, buddy. When I don't like you, you've got problems.  Oh, is this for the fight?
